amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to submit certain budgetary information to the Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2848 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2848 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S11404-11405) To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to submit certain budgetary information to the Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2848 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2848 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
